A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Don't expect any decent answers to the questions left by TFA. This film has a great cast who have been let down by a shabby and shallow storyline full of plot holes and character mishaps. it's as if all the director/writer was bothered about was proving everyone wrong and making it a surprise rather than creating and in-depth masterpiece like it could have been. This film feels like a standalone generic sci-fi rather than the middle film of an epic saga. Ruined characters\, no character development\, pointless side stories and the first order reduced literally to a laughing stock. Before I watched this film I couldn't wait for ep9. But now I don't see how they can fix the problems left by this film. As a running the mill sci-fi its ok but as a starwars films it's interesting  rubbish. I only gave it 2 1/2 stars because the visuals are good and the action is ok.
